com.xorprogramming.wallpaper

Class SimpleWallpaperService

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.app.Service
          • android.service.wallpaper.WallpaperService
            • com.xorprogramming.wallpaper.SimpleWallpaperService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentCallbacks, ComponentCallbacks2

    public abstract class SimpleWallpaperService
extends WallpaperService
    An abstraction of the WallpaperService that uses a WallpaperScene for updating and rendering. The SimpleWallpaperService is intend to be extended and have an inner class that extends SimpleWallpaperService.SimpleEngine.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Steven Roberts
    See Also:
    SimpleWallpaperService.SimpleEngine, WallpaperScene

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SimpleWallpaperService.SimpleEngine<T extends WallpaperScene>
      Handles the rendering of a WallpaperScene and threading required to update it.
